titleStmt.title: A confutation of a certen booke, called a defence of the true, and Catholike doctrine of the sacrame[n]t, &c. sette fourth of late in the name of Thomas Archebysshoppe of Canterburye. By Rycharde Smyth, Docter of diuinite, and some tyme reader of the same in Oxforde
titleStmt.author: Smith, Richard, 1500-1563.

titleStmt.title: A confutation of a certen booke, called a defence of the true, and Catholike doctrine of the sacrame[n]t, &c. sette fourth of late in the name of Thomas Archebysshoppe of Canterburye. By Rycharde Smyth, Docter of diuinite, and some tyme reader of the same in Oxforde
titleStmt.author: Smith, Richard, 1500-1563.

notesStmt.note: A reply to: Cranmer, Thomas. A defence of the true and catholike doctrine of the sacrament of the body and bloud of Christ (STC 6000).
Running title reads: A confutation of the defence of the true and the catholike.
Numerous errors in foliation; foliation deduced from signature collation.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
